name: Move Me
description: This application is a helpful tool for finding movers, storage, or where to rent a truck in your area. CSS Framework used is Bulma. Google, Yelp and Openweathermap APIs have been used to pull the data.

name: Book Tracker
description: This application is a helpful tool for tracking what user is currently reading, what is finished reading. GoogleBook API has been used to pull the book data and Express JS is used for backend with MySQL database.

name: Template Engine - Employee Summary
description: This application will prompt the user for information about the team manager and then information about the team members. The user can input any number of team members, and they may be a mix of engineers and interns. Since testing is a key piece in making code maintainable, there are several unit tests that were tested. When the user has completed building the team, the application will create an HTML file that displays a nicely formatted team roster based on the information provided by the user.

name: Javascript - Password Generator
description: This application generates a random password based on user-selected criteria. This app runs in the browser and feature dynamically updated HTML and CSS powered by JavaScript.

name: ThirdParty API - Workday Scheduler
description: This application is a simple calendar application that allows the user to save events for each stantard business hour of the day. This app will run in the browser and feature dynamically updated HTML and CSS powered by the jQuery.

name: Burger - Handlebars
description: This application is a burger logger with MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars and a ORM. It follows the MVC design pattern; used Node and MySQL to query and route data in the app, and Handlebars to generate HTML.
